item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
London Drugs Logo London Drugs Limited is a Canadian retail pharmacy chain based in Richmond, British Columbia. As of September 2019, the chain had 82 stores in the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba. In addition to pharmacy services, London Drugs locations also sell electronics, housewares, cosmetics, and a limited selection of grocery items. Source
You can download theLondon Drugslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: London Drugs
item.description: London Drugs Limited is a Canadian retail pharmacy chain based in Richmond, British Columbia. As of September 2019, the chain had 82 stores in the provinces of British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba. In addition to pharmacy services, London Drugs locations also sell electronics, housewares, cosmetics, and a limited selection of grocery items. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Shoppers Drug Mart Logo
Shoppers Drug Mart Corporation is a Canadian retail pharmacy chain based in Toronto, Ontario. It has more than 1,300 stores operating under the name Shoppers Drug Mart in nine provinces and two territories, and as Pharmaprix in Quebec. The company was founded by pharmacist Murray Koffler in 1962; the Koffler family still retains ownership of the Super-Pharm pharmacy, which has locations in Israel, Poland, and formerly in China. Super-Pharm’s logo is similar to that of Shoppers Drug Mart, which was created by the artist Sylvain Liu.
You can download theShoppers Drug Martlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Shoppers Drug Mart
item.description: Shoppers Drug Mart Corporation is a Canadian retail pharmacy chain based in Toronto, Ontario. It has more than 1,300 stores operating under the name Shoppers Drug Mart in nine provinces and two territories, and as Pharmaprix in Quebec. The company was founded by pharmacist Murray Koffler in 1962; the Koffler family still retains ownership of the Super-Pharm pharmacy, which has locations in Israel, Poland, and formerly in China. Super-Pharm’s logo is similar to that of Shoppers Drug Mart, which was created by the artist Sylvain Liu.

Boots UK Ltd., trading as Boots, is a health and beauty Retail and pharmacy chain in the United Kingdom and other territories including Ireland and Thailand Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Walgreens Boots Alliance Logo
Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. is an American holding company headquartered in Deerfield, Illinois, that owns Walgreens, Boots, and a number of pharmaceutical manufacturing, wholesale, and distribution companies. The company was formed on December 31, 2014, after Walgreens purchased the 55% stake in UK and Switzerland-based Alliance Boots that it did not already own. The total price of the acquisition was $4.9 billion in cash and 144.3 million common shares with fair value of $10.
You can download theWalgreens Boots Alliancelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Walgreens Boots Alliance
item.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. is an American holding company headquartered in Deerfield, Illinois, that owns Walgreens, Boots, and a number of pharmaceutical manufacturing, wholesale, and distribution companies. The company was formed on December 31, 2014, after Walgreens purchased the 55% stake in UK and Switzerland-based Alliance Boots that it did not already own. The total price of the acquisition was $4.9 billion in cash and 144.3 million common shares with fair value of $10.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 CVS Pharmacy Logo
CVS Pharmacy is a subsidiary of the American retail and health care company CVS Health, headquartered in Woonsocket, Rhode Island. It was also known as, and originally named, the Consumer Value Store and was founded in Lowell, Massachusetts, in 1963. The chain was owned by its original holding company Melville Corporation since its inception until its current parent company (CVS Health) was spun off into its own company in 1996.
You can download theCVSlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: CVS
item.description: CVS Pharmacy is a subsidiary of the American retail and health care company CVS Health, headquartered in Woonsocket, Rhode Island. It was also known as, and originally named, the Consumer Value Store and was founded in Lowell, Massachusetts, in 1963. The chain was owned by its original holding company Melville Corporation since its inception until its current parent company (CVS Health) was spun off into its own company in 1996.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Duane Reade Logo
Duane Reade Inc. (/dweɪn ˈriːd/ dwayn-REED) is a chain of pharmacy and convenience stores owned by Walgreens Boots Alliance. They are primarily located in New York City, known for its high volume small store layouts in densely populated Manhattan locations. In 2012 the company headquarters was moved to 40 Wall Street in Lower Manhattan, the location of its newest flagship store. Source
You can download theDuane Readelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Duane Reade
item.description: Duane Reade Inc. (/dweɪn ˈriːd/ dwayn-REED) is a chain of pharmacy and convenience stores owned by Walgreens Boots Alliance. They are primarily located in New York City, known for its high volume small store layouts in densely populated Manhattan locations. In 2012 the company headquarters was moved to 40 Wall Street in Lower Manhattan, the location of its newest flagship store. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Walgreens Logo
Walgreen Company or simply Walgreens is an American company that operates as the second-largest pharmacy store chain in the United States behind CVS Health. It specializes in filling prescriptions, health and wellness products, health information, and photo services. As of August 31, 2018, the company operated 9,560 stores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and the US territories of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. It was founded in Chicago, Illinois, in 1901.
You can download theWalgreenslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Walgreens
item.description: Walgreen Company or simply Walgreens is an American company that operates as the second-largest pharmacy store chain in the United States behind CVS Health. It specializes in filling prescriptions, health and wellness products, health information, and photo services. As of August 31, 2018, the company operated 9,560 stores in all 50 states, the District of Columbia and the US territories of Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands. It was founded in Chicago, Illinois, in 1901.
